err_conversations_load: An error has occurred while loading the conversations
err_conversation_delete: An error has occurred while deleting the conversation.
err_messages_load: An error has occurred while loading messages.
err_message_send: An error has occurred while sending the message.
err_message_delete: An error has occurred while deleting the message.
err_profile_updating: An error has occurred while update settings.
err_profile_notifications: An error has occurred while loading notifications.
err_recipients: An error has occurred while searching contacts.
conversation_delete_alt: This will permanently delete the conversation.
message_delete_alt: This will permanently delete the message.
